name: Bracers of Wrath
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has superb armour class for its type (little in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users fire resistance strongly.
